MAMP for Windows

Beta

Now available

news.headline: MAMP for Windows Beta released
news.text: April 2, 2014 – We´ve just released MAMP for Windows Beta. Learn all about it and download it on our MAMP for Windows Beta page.

news.headline: MAMP & MAMP PRO 3.0.3 released
news.text:
March 25, 2014 – We´ve updated MAMP & MAMP PRO to Version 3.0.3
This release fixes the registration process bug.
Other improvements are:

MAMP & MAMP PRO:
Updated Apache to 2.2.26
Updated Python to 2.7.6
Updated phpMyAdmin 4.1.9

MAMP PRO:
Modified MySQL setting: max_allowed_packet = 16M
When using Xdebug and PHP CGI mode idle timeout is now 30 minutes (idle-timeout 1800)
Apache directive Allow does no longer require from keyword to be entered
